languages.text: "Мне недостаточно просто убить ее — нет, это слишком... банально? Оставаться вечность заточенной в мучительной темнице, из которой нет спасения — эта участь мне куда больше по душе. Ее ярость и страдания будут питать меня, пока ее дух не иссякнет, словно фонтан крови из перерубленной артерии. Ну и вдобавок... она не сможет вернуться за мной после воскрешения".

"Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."
languages.original_text: "Мне недостаточно просто убить ее — нет, это слишком... банально? Оставаться вечность заточенной в мучительной темнице, из которой нет спасения — эта участь мне куда больше по душе. Ее ярость и страдания будут питать меня, пока ее дух не иссякнет, словно фонтан крови из перерубленной артерии. Ну и вдобавок... она не сможет вернуться за мной после воскрешения".

traits.locale_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it means she will be unable to seek revenge against me after her resurrection."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it means she will be unable to seek revenge against me after her resurrection."

Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it means she will be unable to seek revenge against me after her resurrection."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “仅仅是杀死她，对我来说可远远不够。不行，这实在是……太寡淡了？我要把她永远囚禁在痛苦的牢笼里，让她无处可逃，这才是我更喜欢的结果。她的愤怒与痛苦会始终滋养着我，就像被割破的动脉喷出的鲜血之泉一样，直到她的灵魂干涸为止。而且……这样一来，她的复活也不会很顺利。”
languages.original_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."

traits.locale_text: “仅仅是杀死她，对我来说可远远不够。不行，这实在是……太寡淡了？我要把她永远囚禁在痛苦的牢笼里，让她无处可逃，这才是我更喜欢的结果。她的愤怒与痛苦会始终滋养着我，就像被割破的动脉喷出的鲜血之泉一样，直到她的灵魂干涸为止。而且……这样一来，就算她复活之后，也没办法再向我寻仇。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ただ殺すだけじゃ物足りない…いや、そりゃ陳腐か？逃げ場のない悲しみの檻に、永遠に閉じ込める結末の方が好みだ。奴の怒りと痛みは、切り裂かれた血管から噴き出す血の噴水のように、奴の心が枯れるまで俺の養分になる。それに…そうすれば復活も困難になるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ殺すだけじゃ物足りないーーいや、そりゃ陳腐か？逃げ場のない悲しみの檻に、永遠に閉じ込める結末の方が好みだ。奴の怒りと痛みは、切り裂かれた血管から噴き出す血の噴水のように、奴の心が枯れるまで俺の養分になる。それに…そうすれば復活した後も、俺に復讐することはできないだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « No me basta con matarla sin más; no, eso sería demasiado... ¿banal? Aprisionarla para toda la eternidad en una jaula de sufrimiento de la que no pueda escapar; ese es un destino más apropiado para mi gusto. Su furia y su tormento me nutrirán hasta que su espíritu se seque como una fuente de sangre que brotase de una arteria seccionada. Además... de ese modo le será más difícil resucitar».
languages.original_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."

traits.locale_text: « No me basta con matarla sin más; no, eso sería demasiado... ¿banal? Aprisionarla para toda la eternidad en una jaula de sufrimiento de la que no pueda escapar; ese es un destino más apropiado para mi gusto. Su furia y su tormento me nutrirán hasta que su espíritu se seque como una fuente de sangre que brotase de una arteria seccionada. Además... de ese modo será incapaz de vengarse de mí tras su resurrección».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne me contenterai pas de la tuer, ce serait à la fois trop simple et trop... banal. Je vais plutôt l'enfermer pour l'éternité dans une prison dont elle ne pourra jamais s'échapper. Ainsi, je pourrai me repaître de son calvaire. Je me délecterai de sa fureur et de son tourment jusqu'à ce que son esprit finisse par se tarir comme un geyser de sang jaillissant d'une artère tranchée. Cela aura aussi l'avantage de compliquer sa résurrection. »
languages.original_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne me contenterai pas de la tuer, ce serait à la fois trop simple et trop... banal. Je vais plutôt l'enfermer pour l'éternité dans une prison dont elle ne pourra jamais s'échapper. Ainsi, je pourrai me repaître de son calvaire. Je me délecterai de sa fureur et de son tourment jusqu'à ce que son esprit finisse par se tarir comme un geyser de sang jaillissant d'une artère tranchée. Cela aura aussi l'avantage de l'empêcher de se venger après sa résurrection. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sie einfach nur zu töten, reicht mir nicht – nein, das wäre viel zu ... banal? Ich will sie für alle Ewigkeit in einem elenden Käfig gefangen halten, aus dem sie niemals wieder rauskommt – das ist das Schicksal, was sie erwartet. Ihr Zorn und ihre Qualen werden mich nähren, bis ihr Geist versiegt, wie eine Blutfontäne, die aus einer zerschnittenen Arterie spritzt. Zudem ... könnte es ihren Aufstand problematisch machen."
languages.original_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."

traits.locale_text: "Sie einfach nur zu töten, reicht mir nicht – nein, das wäre viel zu ... banal? Ich will sie für alle Ewigkeit in einem elenden Käfig gefangen halten, aus dem sie niemals wieder rauskommt – das ist das Schicksal, was sie erwartet." Ihr Zorn und ihre Qualen werden mich nähren, bis ihr Geist versiegt, wie eine Blutfontäne, die aus einer zerschnittenen Arterie spritzt. Und außerdem kann sie sich nach ihrer Wiederbelebung so nicht mehr an mir rächen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."

languages.text: "Onu öldürüp geçmek benim için yeterli değil. Hayır, bu çok... Sıradan mı desem? Onu kaçışı bile olmayan bir ızdırap kafesine ebediyen hapsetmek... İşte bu, çok daha hoşuma gidecek bir kader. Öfkesi ve çektiği eziyet, kesilen bir atardamarın fışkıran kanıyla dolu bir çeşme misali ruhu kuruyup gidene dek beni besleyecek. Ayrıca... Dirilmesinde sıkıntı oluşturabilir."
languages.original_text: "Simply killing her is not enough for me — no, it is too... banal? Keeping her imprisoned for all eternity in a cage of misery from which there is no escape — that is a fate more to my liking. Her fury and torment will feed me until her spirit dries up, like a fountain of blood spraying from a sliced artery. And also... it might make her resurrection problematic."

İşte bu, çok daha hoşuma gidecek bir kader. Öfkesi ve çektiği eziyet, kesilen bir atardamarın fışkıran kanıyla dolu bir çeşme misali ruhu kuruyup gidene dek beni besleyecek. Ayrıca... Dirilmesinde sıkıntı oluşturabilir."
